charges.charge_description: Defendant knowingly and intentionally take by force, violence and intimidation United States currency belonging to and in the care, custody, control and management and possession of Shannon Cobbs, bank teller for Regions Bank, 743 N. Highway 67, Cedar Hill, Texas 75104, the deposits of which were then insured by the FDIC, while in possession of a firearm in violation of Title 18 U.S.C. Section 2113(a) and (d) and 18 U.S.C. Section 2
